alert.note: Alert for Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 2:37PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Loup County through 315 PM CDT... At 237 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Taylor, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Taylor, Almeria Meadow State Wildlife Management Area, Horseshoe Bend Lake, Almeria, Hannamon Bayou Campground, Nunda Shoal Campground and Valley View Flat Campground. This includes Highway 183 between mile markers 123 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
